resp = client.search(
    index="kibana_sample_data_ecommerce",
    size="0",
    track_total_hits=False,
    aggregations={
        "sampling": {
            "random_sampler": {
                "probability": 0.1
            },
            "aggs": {
                "price_percentiles": {
                    "percentiles": {
                        "field": "taxful_total_price"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
